    • Constructor Detail

      • FlagActor

        public FlagActor(float x,
                 float y,
                 GDXMap map,
                 boolean load)
        Sets up all the listeners and positions necessary for interacting with the FlagActor on the GDXMap
        Parameters:
        x - The world float x position of the Actor. Never changes.
        y - The world float y position of the Actor. Never changes.
        map - The main GDXMap map window parent.
        load - Boolean value of whether it is being user generated (false) or loaded from save (true)
        See Also:
        Actor
